page.title: 13Games children play
page.content: I am going to list same of the games that children play in the playground. They are: Mother May I, My Red letter, Kingy, Hop scotch, T.V's, British Bull dog, Records, Polo, Stuck in the mud, French Elastic, Face to Face, Off ground tig, Mummies and Daddies , What do you want to be killed by, Basketball, Football, Rebounds, Kick rebounds, Netball, Sevens, Space Invaders. The boys decided that their favourite games are: First; Football Second; Kingy, Third; British Bull Dog. The girls chose First; French, second; Stuck in the mud, Third; Bull Dog.
